mainText:
Its weird the sick feeling in my belly. I know he is only a man, and
there are many other men that die. It is not even rational to me, I
can't explain why I feel like it is so sad. I did not even know him. I
owned one of the first Macs. The world burns a little dimmer now. Rest
in peace Steve Jobs! You were an amazing man.
author: Deanne
